thread.title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Minneapolis Fed President Neel Kashkari

author: wsjcom
title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Minneapolis Fed President Neel Kashkari

organizations.name: wsj interview with minneapolis fed president neel kashkari federal reserve bank of minneapolis

text:
Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari spoke with Wall Street Journal reporter Nick Timiraos on Thursday, April 12, in Minneapolis. He discussed his outlook on employment, inflation and the prospect of additional interest-rate increases this year, as well as his concerns about U.S. trade and fiscal policy. Here is a partial transcript of the interview, lightly edited for clarity and length.
